field.name: summary
field.value: IronPython do not working on WebForms

field.name: description
field.value:
Cannot use IronPython (1.1) on web forms. Page fails with exception:
Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.
Exception Details: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. Parameter name: virtualPaths
Source Error:
Line 187: super(type(self), self).FrameworkInitialize() Line 188: self.___BuildControlTree(self) Line 189: self.AddWrappedFileDependencies(ASP.default_aspx.__fileDependencies) Line 190: self.Request.ValidateInput()
Problem: WebFormsViewEngine should not use Activator.CreateInstance(pageType) to create a page instances. Possible resolution: BuildManager.CreateInstanceFromVirtualPath/AssemblyBuilder.GenerateTypeFactory
